verses.text: And Hiram king of Tyre sent his servants unto Solomon ; for he had heard that they had anointed him king in the room of his father : for Hiram was ever a lover of David.\f + \fr 5.1 \ft Hiram: also called, Huram\f*
And Solomon sent to Hiram , saying ,

Thou knowest how that David my father could not build an house unto the name of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his God for the wars which were about him on every side , until the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* put them under the soles of his feet.
But now the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my God hath given me rest on every side , \add so that there is\add* neither adversary nor evil occurrent.

And, behold, I purpose to build an house unto the name of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my God , as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* spake unto David my father , saying , Thy son , whom I will set upon thy throne in thy room, he shall build an house unto my name.  +  r 5.5  t purpose: Heb. say *

Now therefore command thou that they hew me cedar trees out of Lebanon ; and my servants shall be with thy servants : and unto thee will I give hire for thy servants according to all that thou shalt appoint : for thou knowest that \add there is\add* not among us any that can skill to hew timber like unto the Sidonians.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft appoint: Heb. say\f* \p

¶ And it came to pass, when Hiram heard the words of Solomon , that he rejoiced greatly , and said , Blessed \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* this day , which hath given unto David a wise son over this great people.

And Hiram sent to Solomon , saying , I have considered the things which thou sentest to me for: \add and\add* I will do all thy desire concerning timber of cedar , and concerning timber of fir.\f + \fr 5.8 \ft considered: Heb. heard\f*

My servants shall bring \add them\add* down from Lebanon unto the sea : and I will convey them by sea in floats unto the place that thou shalt appoint me, and will cause them to be discharged there, and thou shalt receive \add them:\add* and thou shalt accomplish my desire , in giving food for my household.\f + \fr 5.9 \ft appoint: Heb. send\f* \p
So Hiram gave Solomon cedar trees and fir trees \add according to\add* all his desire.

And Solomon gave Hiram twenty thousand measures of wheat \add for\add* food to his household , and twenty measures of pure oil : thus gave Solomon to Hiram year by year.\f + \fr 5.11 \ft measures: Heb. cors\f*
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* gave Solomon wisdom , as he promised him: and there was peace between Hiram and Solomon ; and they two made a league together. \p
¶ And king Solomon raised a levy out of all Israel ; and the levy was thirty thousand men.\f + \fr 5.13 \ft levy: Heb. tribute of men\f*
And he sent them to Lebanon , ten thousand a month by courses : a month they were in Lebanon , \add and\add* two months at home : and Adoniram \add was\add* over the levy.
And Solomon had threescore and ten thousand that bare burdens , and fourscore thousand hewers in the mountains ;
Beside the chief of Solomon’s officers which \add were\add* over the work , three thousand and three hundred , which ruled over the people that wrought in the work.
And the king commanded , and they brought great stones , costly stones , \add and\add* hewed stones , to lay the foundation of the house.
And Solomon’s builders and Hiram’s builders did hew \add them\add*, and the stonesquarers : so they prepared timber and stones to build the house.\f + \fr 5.18 \ft stonesquarers: or, Giblites\f*
